xstampp.update

Class ValidationDialogService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.equinox.p2.core.UIServices
      • xstampp.update.ValidationDialogService

  • public class ValidationDialogService
extends org.eclipse.equinox.p2.core.UIServices
    Class that overrides the UIServices so that the security warning dialog won't show
    Author:
    Fabian Toth

      • bindProvisioningAgent

        public void bindProvisioningAgent(org.eclipse.equinox.p2.core.IProvisioningAgent agent)
        This method will override the default UIServices instance within the provisioning agent. This will prevent the blocking "...you're installing untrusted content..." dialog to appear.
        Parameters:
        agent - The P2 provisioning agent.
